metadata.name: Agent Runbook Manager
metadata.description: Actions to create, update, synchronize, share, and manage runbooks using Google Drive and Google Docs

post.description: Creates a new runbook as a Google Doc with the specified title and content.

content.title: Content
content.description: Initial content of the Google Doc (in text or markdown).

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Create Runbook
schema.description: Response with the created document ID and URL or an error message.

post.description: Updates the content of an existing runbook, replacing the current content with the provided content.

document_id.title: Document Id
document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc.

content.title: Content
content.description: The new content to replace the existing content (in text or markdown).

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Update Runbook
schema.description: Response with the updated document ID and a message or an error message.

post.description: Retrieves the content of a runbook.

document_id.title: Document Id
document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc.

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Get Runbook Content
schema.description: Response with the runbook content or an error message.

post.description: Retrieves the version history of a runbook.

document_id.title: Document Id
document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc.

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Get Runbook Version History
schema.description: Response with the version history of the runbook or an error message.

post.description: Reverts a runbook to a specified previous version.

document_id.title: Document Id
document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc.

version_id.title: Version Id
version_id.description: The ID of the version (revision) to revert to.

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Revert Runbook To Version
schema.description: Response with a message indicating the success or failure of the operation.

post.description: Synchronizes the runbook content with the latest updates.

document_id.title: Document Id
document_id.description: The ID of the Google Doc.

new_content.title: New Content
new_content.description: The new content to update in the runbook (in text or markdown).

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Sync Runbook
schema.description: Response with a message indicating the success or failure of the synchronization.

post.description: Get all runbooks from Google Drive that match the given query.

query.title: Query
query.description: Google Drive API V3 query string for search files in the format query_term operator values.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier for the file

mimeType.title: Mimetype
mimeType.description: The MIME type of the file

createdTime.title: Createdtime
createdTime.description: The time at which the file was created (RFC 3339 date-time)

modifiedTime.title: Modifiedtime
modifiedTime.description: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time)

anyOf.description: Email address

owners.title: Owners
owners.description: A list of owners associated with the file

version.title: Version
version.description: The current version of the file

webViewLink.title: Webviewlink
webViewLink.description: A URL for viewing the file in a web browser

emailAddress.title: Emailaddress
emailAddress.description: The email address of the person who has permission

role.title: Role
role.description: The role assigned to the user, such as reader, writer, commenter, organizer or fileOrganizer

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Indicates whether the account associated with this permission has been deleted

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: A list of permissions granted to the file

files.title: Files
files.description: A list of files matching the search query

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Get Runbooks By Query
schema.description: A list of runbooks or an error message if no runbooks were found.

post.description: Get the runbook contents by name.

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Get Runbook Contents By Name
schema.description: The runbook contents or an error message.

post.description: Share a runbook with a specific email address.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the runbook to be shared.

role.title: Role
role.description: Assign a specific role. Possible options are: reader, writer, commenter, organizer, fileOrganizer.

email_address.title: Email Address
email_address.description: The email address of the user or group to share the runbook with.

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for Share Runbook
schema.description: Message indicating the success or failure of the operation.

post.description: List the comments on a specific runbook.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the runbook to read its associated comments.

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier for the comment

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Indicating whether it is a comment or reply

createdTime.title: Createdtime
createdTime.description: The time at which the comment/reply was created (RFC 3339 date-time).

modifiedTime.title: Modifiedtime
modifiedTime.description: The last time the comment/reply was modified (RFC 3339 date-time).

htmlContent.title: Htmlcontent
htmlContent.description: The HTML content of the comment

content.title: Content
content.description: The plain text content of the comment

anyOf.description: Email address

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Indicates if the comment has been deleted

anyOf.description: Indicates if the comment has been resolved

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier for the comment

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Indicating whether it is a comment or reply

createdTime.title: Createdtime
createdTime.description: The time at which the comment/reply was created (RFC 3339 date-time).

modifiedTime.title: Modifiedtime
modifiedTime.description: The last time the comment/reply was modified (RFC 3339 date-time).

htmlContent.title: Htmlcontent
htmlContent.description: The HTML content of the comment

content.title: Content
content.description: The plain text content of the comment

anyOf.description: Email address

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Indicates if the comment has been deleted

anyOf.description: The action the reply performed to the parent comment which can be either resolve or reopen

replies.title: Replies
replies.description: A list of replies to the comment

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: A list of comments on the file

anyOf.description: The resulting data from the request
Error message, if any, from the request

schema.title: Response for List Runbook Comments
schema.description: List of comments associated with the runbook.
